string-array.name: personsFacts
string-array.item: His parents named him after a type of steak. The beef is from a species of cattle, Wagyu, raised in the Kobe region of Japan.
Roger Federer has won the Grand Slam 19 times, and is poised to go down in history as one of the best tennis players the world has ever seen.

Luka Doncic represented the Slovenian club, Union Olimpija, at the under-14 Vasas Intesa Sanpaolo Cup in Budapest where he emerged Most Valuable Player, despite finishing as runners-up to FC Barcelona.
